import React,{ useState,useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Button,Card, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' import axios from 'axios' function ProductScreen({match}) { const [product, setProduct]=useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function fetchProduct(){ const { data }=await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() }, []) return (
Go Back

{product.name}

Price:${product.price} Description:{product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock>0?'In Stock':'Out of Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen
